content: My dear, thanks for sharing your stupidity with such effectiveness. I intuitively follow your steps as I am now in a book writing process. The three buckets you mention, make so much sense to me, that I can see them in front of me, while writing this note. May I be blessed by the angels of stupidity every time I get stuck and then change my focus to become more effective in whatever I am involved with :) Have a great day.
